item.title: Diagnose → Design → Deploy → Gather → Integrate (Core Loop)
item.description:
Summary: Operational flywheel: diagnose constraints, design an asymmetrical solution, deploy, gather data, integrate back into system. Turns ‘failure’ into telemetry.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 1–3

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
